Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Germany to win based on their current form
Pep Guardiola emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession
Miscellaneous Highlights: The sound of bagpipes, and men in kilts on the streets of Munich — Scotland is in town
Others: The final is in Berlin on July 14 and Germany is even keener to get there after three straight fiascos at major tournaments that has forced its fans to readjust their expectations of the men's national team
While the Scots are out in droves in Munich, proudly wearing their team jerseys (many combined with kilts), there is hardly a sighting of a Germany shirt or flag

Political extremists are flourishing, anxiety pervades the country, and the national team has under-performed. It is understandable the home fans are going about their daily life in contrast to the partying visitors
Deniz Undav has said he will shave the head of fellow Germany forward Thomas Müller if the team becomes European champion
